channel.title: R on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A Hugo website

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. Make Code Interactive var bootstrapThebe = function() { thebelab.bootstrap(); } document.querySelector("#activateButton").addEventListener('click', bootstrapThebe) You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) fit <- lm(dist ~ speed, data = cars) fit Including Plots You can also embed plots.
